title: New: Teen Mom – You And Me
content: Washington DC’s Teen Mom write cutesy indie pop, and their debut track You And Me is a fitting introduction to the trio. A three minute twee anthem in waiting, combining the charm of The Pains Of Being Pure At Heart with a faint, slightly gritty edge more commonly associated with the likes of Cloud Nothings. Plenty of warm fuzz, oozing with heartbreak and fantastically enjoyable, as they themselves put it ‘[Teen Mom are] just a band, playing love songs.’. Here’s hoping they have plenty more up their sleeves. Check out You And Me below and head over to their bandcamp for a free download.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
